workflows.creator: 7d4dd504-dc91-4bb9-92ae-804e0988ea0d
workflows.title: Initiate Renewal Sequence - Quotes
workflows.description: LAMBDA-67051 renewal sequence for quote status change

message.value: Prospect Cannot be added to the sequence

boolean-condition-1.title: Mailbox Found?
boolean-condition-1.description:
1) Check if the Prospect Id is found in Outreach 
2) Check if the Custom 1 field is available in Outreach. It is synced from Current Product Family from Contact record.

If any of these is missing then we have added a delay. If it is still missing after the delay, flow terminates

message.value: Prospect with email '{$.steps.salesforce-1.records[0].OpportunityContactRoles.records[0].Contact.Email}' is not found OR Current Product Family is Empty.

value.value: (SELECT Contact.Id, Contact.Email FROM OpportunityContactRoles WHERE IsPrimary = TRUE)
Prospect is active in this sequence.

workflows.title: Add Opportunity to sequence
workflows.description: This workflow will query eligible Opportunities and align them to License Shutdown and AR warning emails. It can be further extended for other sequences

value.value: (SELECT Contact.Id, Contact.Email FROM OpportunityContactRoles WHERE IsPrimary = TRUE)
